title: Spies of Saruman (1R140)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert a [Isengard] minion. Plays on a site. While the fellowship is at this site, skip the archery phase. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.
Lore:	”'…they are crebain out of Fangorn or Dunland. I do not know what they are about….'”
Rarity:	R
